title: PRI's The World: 01/13/2015
teaser: French authorities continue to search for accomplices from last week's deadly attacks. Meanwhile, Charlie Hebdo prepares a new edition with a cover that will feature a Mohammed cartoon. Also, an American Episcopal priest who was ministering in Manhattan after 9/11, is now ministering in Paris. Plus, we look at the legacy of Apartheid on women in Cape Town, and why one Costa Rican town puts molasses on roads.
